name: shuts Wave
description: SWAVE is a strategy backed token following allocations of sh√ºts Crypto strategy. The objective of this strategy is to deliver long-term capital growth while being 100% invested in the cryptocurrency asset class. The strategy is designed to keep the investor invested in winning crypto trends, and to offload losing crypto assets, therefore enhancing risk/return measure. This is a derivative token, created to work similar to a mutal fund/etf. The underlying assets derive the value and growth of the token.
